Game Info: http://www.telltalegames.com/walkingdead/

Instructions for Install:-

This is the 2nd episode of the walking dead game.

Technical info:

Ep1 installed Is Required For Ep2 too work.

Create a folder named "WalkingDead102" in

C:Program Files (x86)The Walking DeadPack (Or whatever the install directory is)

Copy the files into above said created folder and start the game with Walking Dead Episode 1.exe.

Note: You Must Complete Episode 1 In Order Too Play Episode 2.

I copied the files to the pack folder, ran episode 1, tried to continue my last save in the end of episode 1.  after a brief summary of what happened in episode 1, everything goes blank with strange sounds of like the zombies eating or something...I thought it is part of it, but this just played on and on for a very long time with nothing happening.

how do I fix this?

This is for everyone who are not having their decisions carried over:

It's a simple fix. Load up your saved game and pick Episode 1. 

Instead of clicking PLAY, click on REWIND and pick the last chapter, which is you talking to everyone at the Motor Inn. 

Play that chapter the way you did before, and go through the credits. 

Once you're back on the main menu, pick Episode 2 to play. 

You'll see all your reflecting choices on the prologue. Hope this helps you as it helped me.

NOTICE :

@roimoi
Dont copy as the files into the "PACK/DEFAULT" folder like you copy the crack files in other games.

Copy the downloaded folder ie, " THE WALKING DEAD 102 " straight into the "PACK" folder. Now you will have 2 folders in "PACK" folder. ie, the "DEFAULT" folder & " THE WALKING DEAD 102" folder.
Now you can play the game.

All right, so I'm having some trouble with this.  I was playing through ep 2 and quit out of the game.  When I came back to it later, the game had some trouble loading, so I restarted my computer and the game loaded fine, but my save was gone.
